meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Zachary Tomanelli Karen Ruckert Priscilla Emery Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6758.

td.p: Zachary Tomanelli, an online organizer from Brooklyn, New York
Karen Ruckert, a civil rights attorney originally from Topeka, Kansas
Priscilla Emery, a records management consultant from Longwood, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,000)

tr.td: LITERATURE CATS WOULD LOVE
TV CARTOONS
ETIQUETTE
CLEAN UP YOUR ACT
POLITICAL DEFINITIONS
ALSO ON THE FOOTBALL TEAM

One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish

PriscillaKaren
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
